item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion
item.dc:creator: DrIvoRobotnik
item.description:
I’ll support this release so long as ‘facehugger’ mode makes it back into the multiplayer: yes it was stupid, yes it made picking Marine the equivalent to suicide, yes we all hated it - but for the first three rounds it was fucking AWESOME to be an alien.

blue:

i read an article in a magazin on it with pics and shit, and i say this now, dont get your hopes up, this game will fail.

Aliens will eat your fucking guts. Then a Predator will skin your corpse.
This game will be made of win.
Edit: I was going to make a AvP3 thread.:’(

item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion

item.description:
Exoskeletor:

it is something i was waiting for a long time to come.avp2 was so good and i was always thinking why they arent making a new one with extre graphics. atmosphere doesnt look so good for me in the developers videos on gametrailers however… i hope it looks better

will its still in Development stage

I heard that thay ar Done with Predator now and thay ar goin to make the Marines and the Aliens now

but am pretty sure that will be lot of Changes till Release date

item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion
item.dc:creator: InterloperX
item.description:
Thankfully according to Sega’s E3 announcement, AvP3 isn’t going to be third person as formerly thought (actually, I’m thinking it likely the player will be able to select their preference), as the awesome screencap in this link shows.

Here’s hoping that Sega didn’t accidentally mislabel a Colonial Marines screencap.

https://kotaku.com/5270490/what-sega-is-bringing-to-e3-2009

I’m definitely drooling.

Read full topic

item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Red’]If anyone sees a thread that they interpret as a personal attack, report it. Otherwise let’s please get back to the topic at hand.

PCZone just did a preview of the game with a few shots and an interview with a top Rebellion bod, it was enough to encourage my optimism. I might re-read it and fish for any pertinent info to share, although it was pretty sparse on the details this far out from release.

Read full topic

item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion
item.dc:creator: Collision
item.description:
Jambo:

Good lord what is wrong with you people?!

This exact video was posted in a similar thread on another gamer forum I frequent, and you know what they did? They discussed the upcoming game. They talked about Colonial Marines. They talked about all the fun they had with AvP and AvP2.

But here everyone has to jump in, bitch about somebody trying to start an actual discussion, vomit out a few memes and start fights.

:brow:

QTF.

Tbh, it’s all the noobs attacking Hot, which is sad.

Read full topic

item.title: AVP3: Aliens vs Predator 3 - Trailers/Discussion
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
As was Iron Storm, epic, epic game.

I don’t get the point of being so pessimistic about it, they have made some great games and some bad games. Wait for more previews and media to come out before you get all doom and gloom. So far it looks very exciting.

Read full topic
